r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * Add XML_RPC_Message::$remove_extra_lines property. Defaults to true. If set to false, extra lines are left in place. Bug 7088. * Add XML_RPC_Message::$response_payload property. Makes logging responses easy.
